top.title: details
top.desc: See everything you've been missing and get the best possible performance from your equipment with the Monster® ultimate performance TV cleaning kit. Monster ScreenClean is a dripless, streak-free cleaning solution that is perfect for cleaning your camcorder, camera lenses, high-definition monitors, video displays, and your big screen TV.

features.copy: Thicker, drip-free, solution avoids liquid damage
Single-stream sprayer for no lost moisture
Plastic cap with ridged grip lines for superb handling

extras.title: what's in the box
extras.copy: AM Loop Antenna, Lithium Battery CR2032
